title: Front Brake Master Cylinder - Installation

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Caution - Do not spill brake fluid
To prevent paint damage, do not spill brake fluid onto any area of the bodywork. Spilled brake fluid will damage paintwork.
Front Brake Master Cylinder Installation D71; D74; DR4; DS1; DS4; DSA; DSB; DSX
Locate the master cylinder to the handlebars and position the clamp with the UP arrow pointing upwards. Do not tighten the clamp bolts at this stage.

The use of brake fluids other than those DOT 4 fluids listed in the General Information section may reduce the efficiency of the braking system leading to loss of motorcycle control and an accident.
Observe the brake fluid handling warnings given earlier in this section of the manual.
